title: Classification and Analysis Design of Educational Objectives for Mathematics Instruction

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Mathematical problem-solving simulations in VR environments with Bloom’s taxonomy-based objective-setting exercises

learning_goals: Learners can hierarchically classify mathematics curriculum objectives using Bloom’s Taxonomy six levels.
Learners develop the ability to design specific math learning outcomes using measurable verbs.
Learners solve higher-order mathematical problems (analysis, evaluation, creation) in VR simulations with 80% accuracy.
Learners develop the ability to improve the clarity and measurability of instructional objective statements based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
